Desc.entry: Sessions include: adult only, women only, aqua aerobics, junior and adult lessons, 50+ sessions, parent and toddler, mini polo, diving, synchronised swimming, holistic therapies, sports injury management, sunbooth, sauna, parties and fun splash sessions. Also provide First Aid training and Lifeguard courses. Pool also available for private hire.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 7am-9.30pm, Sat & Sun 7am-2.30pm (opening times), please contact for details and times of individual sessions
